mehi palamu adiyara madawachchiya sita madupara dakwa idikala athara mehi dumriya dhawana katayuthu me wana witath aarambha kara thibe.dumriyak awasan wathawata kolambaa sita thaleyimannarama dakwa gaman kara aththe mita awurudu wisipahakatath epita kalayediya. 1990 juni doloswana dina thaleyimannaramata langawu thapal rathri dumriya juni dahathunwenida yalith kolambaa bala dhawanaya wu athara ethansita ada dakwa thaleyimannarame maha polowa dumriyaka pahasa windagaththe natha.
